text: Slacker is a 1990 American comedy-drama movie directed by Richard Linklater (who also stars) and also starring Lee Daniel, Teresa Taylor, Abra Moore, Louis Black, Kim Krizan, Louis Mackey. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1990 comedy-drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Richard Linklater Category:Movies about social issues Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies
title: Slacker (movie)
